content.query:
-- CREATE EXTERNAL TABLES AS SELECT (CETAS)
--- that Counts individual by age group

-- 1. switch to use woca_ldw
USE woca_ldw
GO 

IF OBJECT_ID('silver.IndividualAgeGroupCount') IS NOT NULL
    DROP EXTERNAL TABLE silver.IndividualAgeGroupCount
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE silver.IndividualAgeGroupCount
    WITH
    (
        DATA_SOURCE = woca_data_src,
        LOCATION = 'silver/IndividualAgeGroupCount',
        FILE_FORMAT = parquet_file_format
    )
AS
SELECT 
    age_group_name,
    COUNT(age_group_name) AS totals
FROM silver.Individual
WHERE age_group_name IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY age_group_name
ORDER BY totals DESC;
